title: zakservers
author: zakservers
content: We would like to offer our new line of offshore dedicated servers in Switzerland, Switzerland is famous for its privacy and client protection policies and you can host almost any type of content with freedom on these servers.We have three pre-configured servers ready to order available here: https://www.zakservers.com/offshore-dedicated-servers.phpHowever you can also customize the quote according to your needs, kindly contact with sales department with your needs of CPU, RAM and storage and our sales will create a custom quote for you according to your needs.All servers come with our regular 24/7/365 customer caring support with 15 minutes guaranteed response time.We do accept crypto and BTC as a payment method, and provide enhanced client privacy and protection.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: zakservers on November 21, 2023, 12:35:12 PMWe would like to offer our new line of offshore dedicated servers.Can you explain to me exactly what offshore means and what is the essential difference between offshore and dedicated servers? Or is it just a marketing trick, to make the service packages sound more powerful?Also, To pay with Bitcoin, do you use an intermediary service, a payment gateway, or is the service directly through you?

comments.author: zakservers
comments.body: Offshore dedicated servers is not a marketing gimmick, mostly dedicated servers have physical location located in USA, Canada or UK, these are called onshore dedicated servers, the major difference is the type of content and freedom of speech on both of these servers, as onshore dedicated servers are strictly abide by the rules of USA, UK etc (depending upon which country server is located in), so that means there are quite a few regulations on which type of content you can host on them, and if you violate it, your server will get suspended or terminated, an offshore server means that a server that is physically hosted on an offshore location like Switzerland, Bulgaria, Netherlands etc, and these servers are abide by the local law on these countries, which are very open about freedom of content, that means you can almost host any type of content on them without any legal issues.About the BTC payment we do use blockonomics to accepted BTC payments, though blockonomics only act as an address generator and current USD to BTC conversion, and all payments are directly credited to us (blockonomics has no wallet or any other stuff of their own).Thanks and if you have any further questions you can always update here, or can visit our website and contact with sales.

comments.author: target
comments.body: Almost all types of content can be hosted without issues. Almost. If we are to host a Mixer that requires to be untouchable is likely not possible. But maybe adult content is not gonna be a problem for these servers as long as the owner uploads original photos and videos.Â  But if warez and movies, that's when they'd be taken down.What are example sites hosted on the offshore if you don't mind telling?

comments.author: zakservers
comments.body: Actually due to privacy reasons, we can not share the websites hosted on our servers, though you have summed up quite good, actually warez and movies are fine too, as many jurisdictions like Bulgaria, Switzerland, would want a complaint issued and verified by a competent authority within EU, if you simply send an email with the complaint, that gets ignored, and very few big companies have the resources to do that, it takes investment with law firms, so they do not go after you if your website is not super big or famous, so mostly you get along with almost any sort of content on offshore servers.Thanks.

comments.author: anubizz
comments.body: In short:If you do not violate the law of Switzerland itself, you are on save ground and your privacy and your clients privacy, will be fully protected by the strong Swiss privacy law. Complaints from EU or US authorities will not be farer investigated in that case.If you break Switzerlands laws, your privacy is in danger.
